Node.Speaker: Agni
Node.Text: OMG, can you believe Dr. G cancelled class on us again yesterday? I was stranded at school for hours!

Node.Speaker: Ryker
Node.Text: Why didn’t you just run home, Agni?

Node.Speaker: Agni
Node.Text: Not everyone’s a speedster like you, Ryker! Well, he better not have cancelled class again or I’m gonna flip!

Node.Speaker: Ryker
Node.Text: Holy crap! You just about gave me a heart attack, Kitty!

Node.Speaker: Kitty
Node.Text: What the heck. What kind of greeting is that, Ryker?

Node.Speaker: Ryker
Node.Text: Hey, so… does something seem odd to you guys today? Maybe we should go home.

Node.Speaker: Agni
Node.Text: Don’t be such a wuss! But now that you mention it -

Node.Speaker: Agni
Node.Text: Let’s get to school quick! I’m sure Dr. G knows what’s going on!
